summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 DOUBLE D HORSE TRAILER. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE TRAILER WAS SEVERELY RUSTED TO THE POINT WHERE IT WAS FRACTURING. THE TRAILER WAS NOT INSPECTED BY A DEALER NOR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND OFFERED NO ASSISTANCE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 3,000.  UPDATED 04/15/11*LJ   UPDATED 1/13/2012 *LN *TR
